name: Dvalin's Plume
description: A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.  As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth ofwinds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it couldwhip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its formerowner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.
